Texts.Eng:
An uplifted species by the Vel'uuish. This telepathic and telekinetic species follows their uplifters in their culture and use of technology. They love making terrible cat-based puns.

 ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Very nimble. Gain ^green;20^reset;% Jump and ^green;8^reset;% Run Speed^reset;. Fall Damage x^green;0.2^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Cold Resist
  Night Vision
  Tech: ^green;Razor Claws^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Jungle Dirt and Mud

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Jungle, Primeval, Forest, Rainforest, Desert^reset;: Health x^green;1.1^reset;, Energy x^green;1.15^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Fists, Daggers, Shortswords: +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance
  Thrown Weapons/Grenades: Damage x^green;1.25^reset;
  Magnorb: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance
  Arm Cannon: Defense & Damage  x^green;1.15^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic and Electric
